# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously crafted to provide exceptional value and satisfaction. This product is truly a testament to quality and excellence, and I believe it holds immense potential to enrich your life or work in significant ways. Given its unique features and benefits, I kindly propose a special introductory price of $85 for you, reflecting my confidence in its ability to exceed your expectations. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this offer. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $85. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $85
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $100
